module.title: leas
module.p: cha leig thu leas sin a dhèanamh you needn’t do that

Examples –
Is fhada bhon a bha daoine ag ràdh gum biodh àite cruinneachaidh do luchd-labhairt na Gàidhlig na leas do chor a’ chànain, na ghoireas don fheadhainn a bha an-sàs ann an gnìomhan Gàidhlig mar-thà agus na mheadhan air aire agus ùidh sa Ghàidhlig a thogail.
For a long time people were saying that a gathering place for Gaelic speakers would be a benefit to the state of the language, an amenity for those who were involved in Gaelic activities already and a means of raising awareness and interest in Gaelic. td. 85
